questions.question: Why is blockchain famous?
options: A) It provides a feature of digitization
B) It provides a feature of trust
C) It provides a feature of immutability

questions.question: Who should get into blockchain?
options: B) Anyone with a business mindset
C) Both technical and non-technical people
D) No one is required to have any background

questions.question: What are the prerequisites for blockchain?
What is the main purpose of a front-end framework in web development?
What is the best practice for handling errors in JavaScript?
options: C) Logging errors to a file

questions.question: How often should you update your dependencies in a project?
What is the difference between a GET and POST request?
options: A) GET requests are used for updating data, while POST requests are used for creating new data
B) GET requests are used for retrieving data, while POST requests are used for sending data
C) GET requests are used for creating data, while POST requests are used for deleting data
D) GET requests are used for sending data, while POST requests are used for receiving data

questions.question: How do you ensure the security of a web application?
options: A) Using strong passwords and two-factor authentication

questions.question: What is the purpose of a CSS reset file?
options: A) To apply global styles to an entire website
B) To reset default browser styles
C) To create a consistent layout for all pages

questions.question: How do you handle conflicts between different browsers in web development?
options: A) By using the latest version of each browser
B) By testing on multiple browsers simultaneously
C) By using a single, universal solution
D) By ignoring browser differences altogether
